incidents.title: Degraded response time
incidents.description: A misconfiguration in the load balancers led to a redirect loop where each load balancer forwarded the request to another load balancer until one of the two without the new configuration (speaking of failsafes) was hit.

incidents.title: Downtime
incidents.description:
A downtime occurred to some servers due to an unexpected water damage to one of our power regulators.

Some services are being served by failsafe locations which might respond more slowly.
